entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sioux Lookout
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:31 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
